name: Fritzing Module File
summary: Learn about .FZM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Modules are made up of two or more parts that a user has connected to function as one part inside Fritzing. For a collection of unconnected parts, Fritzing uses the .FZB bin file.

description: An FZM file is a module file created and used by Fritzing, an open-source application used to design electronic circuits. It stores information that describes a collection of parts that function as one unit in Fritzing.
